about_the_game:
I. Game Background
"FuXiShi" is based on Chinese mythology and takes place in the era of barbarism. It tells the story of the development of human civilization and the war between humans and monsters.

II. Gameplay
The gameplay focuses on character and monster development, as well as weapon and item collection. Players can not only rely on their powerful cultivation and weapons to dominate the battlefield, but also tame demons and cultivate powerful minions to follow them into battle.
The game adopts a high degree of freedom and high randomness design. The specific settings will be announced together with the release of the game's official version (stay tuned).

III. Combat System
Real-time combat allows players to have a more enjoyable combat experience. The success or failure of the battle mainly depends on the level, equipment, and attributes of the characters, making it a non-hardcore game.

short_description: FuXiShi is a 3D action role-playing game with a mythological theme. The game is set in a barbaric era after the collapse of human civilization, where monsters and demons are rampant. Players will play as the heroic character who destroys the demons and protects the civilization of the FuXi tribe.
